meanings.definition: To replace the facing or surface material of (a building, furniture, etc.)
meanings.sent1: She is refacing the old kitchen cabinets with a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter will be refacing the front of the house with new bricks.
meanings.sent3: After refacing the worn-out table, it looked as good as new.
meanings.sent4: The artist was refacing the canvas with vibrant colors, transforming it completely.
meanings.sent5: Refacing the worn steps made them safer and more attractive.
